DOC.detailed_description: This single institution phase 2 clinical trial evaluate efficacy , safety , tolerability tailor temozolomide therapy patient acute myeloid leukemia ( AML ) poor risk feature . Patients assign 1 2 parallel treatment group base AGAT promoter region methylation status , determine PCR . Patients achieve complete remission 1 2 cycle chemotherapy eligible receive additional 5 cycle temozolomide 5 19 day , depend methylation status AGAT promoter ( consolidation phase ) .
